    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RTC getInstance(android.content.Context context)

      • getRTCDateTime

        public java.lang.String getRTCDateTime()
        This method is used to get the date and time from the RTC module.
        Returns:
        The current date and time in the RTC module, in String format, for example,"20210518093020"

      • setRTCDateTime

        public int setRTCDateTime(java.lang.String data)
        This method is used to set the date and time to the RTC module.
        Parameters:
        data - The date and time, in String format, for example, "20210518093020".
        Returns:
        0:success; other values:error. reference toErrCode
